necklaces.productName: Dainty Name Necklace with Vintage Flower
necklaces.description: A beautiful dainty name necklace featuring a vintage flower design. Perfect for personalizing your style.

details.goldPlating: 22K Gold plated with the best polish available in the market.
details.waterResistant: Can withstand normal splashes of water
details.qualityGuarantee: We provide a 90 days warranty wherein normal splashes of water will not affect the shine of the product.
details.productionTime: It takes us 7-8 business days (excluding Sat-Sun) to make the product as we handle it with care and post quality check, we ship the product.

careInstructions: KEEP AWAY FROM MOISTURE: Avoid moisture sources like face mists, perfumes, and moisturizers. Do not wear jewelry while bathing or exercising, and avoid using chemicals for cleaning.
STORE THEM CAREFULLY: Store jewelry in separate zip locks to prevent rubbing and discoloration. Use a soft cloth or cotton to gently wipe after use.
AVOID CONTINUOUS USAGE: Give your jewelry a break to prevent wear and tear on the metal or stones.
